name: Trump Wall (trumpwall)
description:
"Do you want to make America safe again?"

"Do you want to make America great again?"

Donald Trump does. So help him to stop immigrants coming through the border while you're building the biggest wall as possible.

"Our country is in serious troubles, we're having people coming in through the border, that there are not the people we want". He said.
So help him to stop them, by killing them all. Enjoy this funny version of Trump making America great again.

Collect points and share your best score with your friends.
